name: Mimic Run
description:
Description

A game where you play as a little mimic in a cardboard box, Dodging the Obstacles of an infinite Alleyway to escape the secret agent trying to catch you.

This is my first game I've felt comfortable showing to people. Whether you like it or not personally I've learned a lot from the process of making it and id appreciate anyone who plays this game and becomes apart of the first game process. 

The game might still have some kinks or bugs, feel free to report them in the comments. I might come back to it and add stuff in time, Stuff like things to use the souls to purchase like skins or boosts or retries , etc..  For now I need to move on to a new project.

Was designed for mobile but the other platforms work fine
